CommandReport.Name: export
CommandReport.Description: Exports static html content for all of the documentation projects in the specified folder

ArgumentReport.Name: output
ArgumentReport.Description: The directory to output the application

FlagReport.Description: Override the root path forcing all urls to be relative (e.g., 'make everything relative to /ripple')
Output report of all downloaded files
Disables the bottle and code snippet scanning while this command runs
If set, the relative starting url at which to open the browser
If you are running a class library, sets the preference for the profile to load. As in bin/[BuildFlag]. Default is debug
IP Port. Default is 5500
Specific name of an IApplicationSource class that builds this application
Overrides the directory that is the physical path of the running fubumvc application
Start the default browser to the home page of this application
Open a 'watched' browser with WebDriver to refresh the page on content or application recycles
Browser to use in watched. Default is Firefox because it's more stable.
Unless this flag is set, the fubumvc application will run in Development mode

UsageReport.Description: Exports static html content for all of the documentation projects in the specified folder

CommandReport.Name: reorder
CommandReport.Description: Reorder the topics and topic folders within the current directory

FlagReport.Description: Directs the command to open a temporary file in which to specify the reordering

UsageReport.Description: Reorder the topics and topic folders within the current directory

CommandReport.Name: list
CommandReport.Description: Lists the topics and/or todo's in a document project directory

ArgumentReport.Name: mode
ArgumentReport.Description: Choose what gets listed for the current document directory. Default is 'topics'

UsageReport.Description: Lists all the topics under this directory
Lists the selected reports for the topics under this directory

CommandReport.Name: bottle
CommandReport.Description: Packages up a documentation project as a FubuWorld bottle

FlagReport.Description: If selected, disables the creation of the pak-WebContent.zip file
The directory holding the docs. Will try to find a single directory containing the name 'Docs' under an 'src' folder if this flag is not specified

UsageReport.Description: Packages up a documentation project as a FubuWorld bottle

CommandReport.Name: snippets
CommandReport.Description: Scrapes the entire solution for files with code snippets and places those files under the '/snippets' directory of the documentation project

FlagReport.Description: Scans and lists codesnippets, but does not perform the import
Turns off most of the tracing messages
Finds and lists all the existing code snippets, but does not execute anything
The directory holding the docs. Will try to find a single directory containing the name 'Docs' under an 'src' folder if this flag is not specified

UsageReport.Description: Scrapes the entire solution for files with code snippets and places those files under the '/snippets' directory of the documentation project

CommandReport.Name: add-topics
CommandReport.Description: Add one or more topics to a directory fast

UsageReport.Description: Add one or more topics to a directory fast

CommandReport.Name: smoke
CommandReport.Description: Tests each documentation endpoint for Http errors for the doc projects in this folder

FlagReport.Description: Disables the bottle and code snippet scanning while this command runs
If set, the relative starting url at which to open the browser
If you are running a class library, sets the preference for the profile to load. As in bin/[BuildFlag]. Default is debug
IP Port. Default is 5500
Specific name of an IApplicationSource class that builds this application
Overrides the directory that is the physical path of the running fubumvc application
Start the default browser to the home page of this application
Open a 'watched' browser with WebDriver to refresh the page on content or application recycles
Browser to use in watched. Default is Firefox because it's more stable.
Unless this flag is set, the fubumvc application will run in Development mode

UsageReport.Description: Tests each documentation endpoint for Http errors for the doc projects in this folder

CommandReport.Name: run
CommandReport.Description: Runs a FubuDocs documentation project with Katana

If set, the relative starting url at which to open the browser
If you are running a class library, sets the preference for the profile to load. As in bin/[BuildFlag]. Default is debug
IP Port. Default is 5500
Specific name of an IApplicationSource class that builds this application
Overrides the directory that is the physical path of the running fubumvc application
Start the default browser to the home page of this application
Open a 'watched' browser with WebDriver to refresh the page on content or application recycles
Browser to use in watched. Default is Firefox because it's more stable.
Unless this flag is set, the fubumvc application will run in Development mode

UsageReport.Description: Runs a FubuDocs documentation project with Katana
